mapper.select: select * from rpt_sett_income_cut a where a.log_id= #{logId} and a.BUKRS like '833%' order by REMARK ASC

select distinct c.rn2 as "id", c.COLUMN_NAME as "name", c.rn1 from rpt_sett_log a, rpt_sett_def b, v_rpt_sett_format c where a.batch_id = b.batch_id and b.report_id = c.SHEET_CODE and a.log_id = #{logId} order by c.rn1 ASC

select a.report_id as "reportId", a.report_name as "reportName", a.acct_month as "acctMonth", a.area_id as "areaId", a.area_name as "areaName", a.hor_code as "horCode", a.ver_code as "verCode", a.index_allis as "indexAllis", a.income_source as "incomeSource", a.source_name as "sourceName", a.index_data as "indexData" from rpt_sett_import_data a, rpt_sett_state b where a.acct_month = b.acct_month and a.report_id = b.report_id and b.log_id = #{logId} and a.income_source = #{incomeSource}
select distinct REPORT_ID as "id", REPORT_ID || '-' || REPORT_NAME as "name", REPORT_ID as "data" from rpt_sett_def order by REPORT_ID ASC
